mapper.select: SELECT A.EXTNCT_MBR_FG_CD , A.MBR_FG_NM /* 회원구분 */ , A.EXTNCT_MBR_FG_NM /* 항목 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.UNITED_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS OCBCOM /* OCB.com 고객수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.EMAIL_ADDR IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS EM /* EM 고객수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.CLPHN_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.CLPHN_CORCT_FG_CD IN ('1','3') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SMS /* SMS고객수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN (B.CLPHN_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.CLPHN_CORCT_FG_CD IN ('1','3')) OR B.JOBP_TEL_NO IS NOT NULL OR B.HOME_TEL_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TM /* TM고객수 */ , COUNT(1) AS TOT_CNT /* 전체고객수 */ , SUM(B.AVL_PNT) AS TOT_PNT /* 전체포인트 */ FROM MART_EXTNCT_MBR_FG_CD_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN MART_EXTNCT_MBR_NOTI_MST B ON A.EXTNCT_MBR_FG_CD = B.EXTNCT_MBR_FG_CD WHERE B.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /* 조회년월 */ GROUP BY A.EXTNCT_MBR_FG_CD, A.MBR_FG_NM, A.EXTNCT_MBR_FG_NM ORDER BY A.EXTNCT_MBR_FG_CD
